医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
壳聚糖填塞：治疗产后出血的突破研究人员强调，壳聚糖覆盖的填塞物是治疗产后出血的一种有前途且易于使用的治疗方法，产后出血是孕产妇死亡的主要原因，特别是在无法获得先进医疗干预的情况下。这种方法安全有效，在紧急情况下提供了一个重要的选择，正如他们的研究中详细介绍的那样，包括应用指南和演示视频。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Chitosan-tamponades-A-breakthrough-in-treating-postpartum-hemorrhage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Chitosan-tamponades-A-breakthrough-in-treating-postpartum-hemorrhage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0502564c-e5d8-468d-9f2d-d06598e91e5a Thu, 23 Nov 2023 21:23:00 -0500 Chitosan tamponades: A breakthrough in treating postpartum hemorrhage
肥胖与前列腺癌风险相关：新研究揭示了来自父亲的遗传危险一项对 280 多项研究肥胖对致癌和遗传性影响的研究的回顾显示，肥胖会增加患前列腺癌的风险，并且可能会遗传自肥胖的父亲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Obesity-linked-to-prostate-cancer-risk-New-study-uncovers-inherited-dangers-from-fathers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Obesity-linked-to-prostate-cancer-risk-New-study-uncovers-inherited-dangers-from-fathers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f616c37d-7c98-41ea-9397-9afe513310b7 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 21:06:00 -0500 Obesity linked to prostate cancer risk: New study uncovers inherited dangers from fathers
研究量化了英国非住院患者管理长期新冠肺炎的高成本BMC 初级保健研究估计了英国非住院患者的长期新冠肺炎治疗的巨额费用，显示诊断出长期新冠肺炎患者、老年人、女性、肥胖者和患有合并症的患者的费用更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-quantizes-high-costs-of-managing-long-COVID-in-non-hospitalized-UK-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-quantizes-high-costs-of-managing-long-COVID-in-non-hospitalized-UK-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e03c96df-1f0e-4e88-b438-b34ff4ba56c4 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:46:00 -0500 Study quantifies high costs of managing long-COVID in non-hospitalized UK patients
澳大利亚女性子宫内膜异位症的诊断延迟了十年昆士兰大学的一项研究显示，患有子宫内膜异位症的澳大利亚女性在被诊断之前可能会经历大约十年的症状，包括严重的经痛、抑郁和背痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Australian-women-experience-decade-long-delay-in-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Australian-women-experience-decade-long-delay-in-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dab2de3c-a2c6-476e-9ea7-d91978cedd0b Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:44:33 -0500 Australian women experience decade-long delay in diagnosis of endometriosis
研究显示，大流行期间的隔离措施导致 SARS-CoV-2 变种传播速度更快、传播力更强《自然通讯》的一项研究发现，COVID-19 大流行期间的隔离做法影响了 SARS-CoV-2 的进化，导致病毒载量峰值更早、更高但感染持续时间更短的变种，这表明传播能力正在向增加的方向转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Isolation-measures-during-pandemic-drove-faster-more-transmissible-SARS-CoV-2-variants-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Isolation-measures-during-pandemic-drove-faster-more-transmissible-SARS-CoV-2-variants-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c98b31f-28d6-4f85-b5ce-1db441811b9f Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:31:00 -0500 Isolation measures during pandemic drove faster, more transmissible SARS-CoV-2 variants, study reveals
研究显示，自 1999 年以来，燃煤发电厂导致美国 46 万人死亡根据同类最长期的全国性研究，1999 年至 2020 年间，美国有超过 46 万人因接触燃煤发电厂排放的空气污染而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Coal-burning-power-plants-responsible-for-460000-deaths-in-the-US-since-1999-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Coal-burning-power-plants-responsible-for-460000-deaths-in-the-US-since-1999-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db297e75-66c1-4633-8a7e-5130f2969e37 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:14:45 -0500 Coal-burning power plants responsible for 460,000 deaths in the U.S. since 1999, study shows
新研究表明膳食饱和脂肪可能影响雄性激素水平研究发现中年男性的膳食脂肪和雄激素水平之间没有独立的联系；然而，用饱和脂肪酸代替蛋白质热量可能会提高血清雄激素水平，这表明饮食对男性荷尔蒙健康有潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Dietary-aturated-fats-may-influence-male-hormone-levels-new-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Dietary-aturated-fats-may-influence-male-hormone-levels-new-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52ec54ea-7ca4-4b1d-9f4e-2af98c7a1a08 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:08:00 -0500 Dietary saturated fats may influence male hormone levels, new study suggests
孟德尔随机化揭示糖尿病与胰腺癌之间的因果关系宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。本研究通过使用孟德尔随机化 (MR) 方法和广泛的人类全基因组关联研究 (GWAS) 数据集，调查了糖尿病与胰腺癌易感性之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Mendelian-randomization-reveals-a-causal-relationship- Between-diabetes-mellitus-and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Mendelian-randomization-reveals-a-causal-relationship- Between-diabetes-mellitus-and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0166285b-ee87-4d96-b934-65100e9510b8 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:00:57 -0500 Mendelian randomization reveals a causal relationship between diabetes mellitus and pancreatic cancer
基因组研究揭示大麻使用障碍与肺癌风险之间的遗传联系《自然遗传学》杂志上的一项全基因组关联研究揭示了对大麻使用障碍的遗传学的见解，强调了其与精神病理学的密切关联以及与肺癌的因果关系，并提出了与单纯使用大麻不同的遗传途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Genome-study-unveils-genic-ties- Between-cannabis-use-disorder-and-lung-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Genome-study-unveils-genic-ties- Between-cannabis-use-disorder-and-lung-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3ed2d2d-811c-4cd4-81f6-a29f8da90130 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:35:00 -0500 Genome study unveils genetic ties between cannabis use disorder and lung cancer risk
研究人员确定了治疗巴斯综合征的潜在新药物靶点在今天发表的《自然代谢》论文中，匹兹堡大学的研究人员详细介绍了治疗巴斯综合征的潜在新靶点和小分子候选药物，巴斯综合征是一种罕见的、危及生命且目前无法治愈的遗传性疾病，具有毁灭性的后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Researchers-identify-pottial-new-drug-target-for-treating-Barth-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Researchers-identify-pottial-new-drug-target-for-treating-Barth-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2081a9a3-6e24-45d2-960f-e0863e27a19a Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:27:34 -0500 Researchers identify potential new drug target for treating Barth syndrome
